CustomField.description: Used in Workflow field update to roll up to Opportunity Formula used to be: IF( SB_Gross_Participation__c <> 0, Margin_pct__c * SB_Gross_Participation__c , IF( Volume__c <> 0, Volume__c * Margin_Trading__c , IF( Volume_Transactional__c <> 0, Fee_Comm__c * Volume_Transactional__c , IF( Fee_Advisory__c <> 0, Fee_Advisory__c , null ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Current Year Product Revenue (Num)
